shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.title: Paddlers brave the cold in Scranton for Shiverfest
shorts.title_distilled: Paddlers brave the cold in Scranton for Shiverfest.
shorts.description: Over 30 participants braved the cold to paddle three miles down the Lackawanna River for Shiverfest, supporting efforts to maintain clean waterways in Scranton.

shorts.title: Winter weather keeps plow truck drivers busy
shorts.title_distilled: Winter weather keeps plow truck drivers busy.
shorts.description: DICKSON CITY, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A round of winter is keeping plow truck drivers busy to start the weekend. While the Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) and many communities were tackling state and local roads, other plow operators were taking care of businesses and private properties. Snow plow drivers: The unsung heroes of each [...]

shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — The winter weather is perfect for some folks and events across northeastern and central Pennsylvania. shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU) — Speed limits were restored Saturday afternoon after being restricted by the Pennsylvania Department of Transportation (PennDOT) for winter weather conditions. shorts.description: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Lackawanna County and the City of Scranton extended a Code Blue Frigid Weather Alert through next week. The alerts are issued between 8:00 p.m. and 7:00 a.m. on Saturday, Sunday, Monday, and Tuesday nights. St. Anthony’s Haven, Weston Field House, and the Community Intervention Center will serve as emergency shelters for [...]
